resources.string: Skip tracks on volume keys long-press while screen is off
Change will be applied after reboot
Enables advanced reboot menu with options to reboot to recovery
Controls cursor using volume keys in text fields
Langt trykk for å ta opp
Allows to show or hide QuickSettings tiles in statusbar
Contains all other tweaks not falling into specific category
Coded by C3C076@XDA. Touch to visit official thread.
Coded by rovo89@XDA. Touch to visit official thread.
Touch to support development by donating via PayPal
Din enhet vil starte på nytt.
Din enhet vil restarte til recovery modus.
Din enhet vil restarte til bootloader modus.
Launches application that allows to set ringtone and notification sounds separately for each SIM
Allows to set custom background color for lockscreen
Allows to set custom background image for lockscreen
Disables intrusive LED flashing when battery is low and not charging
Allows to set minimum brightness level. Applies to manual brightness setting. (requires reboot)
Allows to set ambient light levels and corresponding LCD backlight values
It is not recommended to set brightness below %d
Values cannot be lower or equal to zero
Values on lower levels cannot be greater than values on higher levels
Values on higher levels cannot be smaller than values on lower levels
Allows menu key to be used for quick-unlocking the device while on lockscreen (requires reboot)
Contains various tweaks for media and audio system
Adds more volume steps for music stream (requires reboot)
Activates or deactivates safe headset media volume feature
Allows to set custom actions on navigation keys (hardware and software)
Applies to Kill foreground app action. Defines for how long key must be pressed to trigger kill
Defines how fast key must be tapped to trigger double-tap
Allows to define action to be performed when device is flipped face down while ringing
Defines how many QuickSettings tiles to display per one row, being tiles resized accordingly (applies to portrait mode on phones or any orientation mode on tablets)
When disabled, volumes for ringtone and notifications can be set independently
QuickSettings will show automatically when status bar is pulled down while there are no notifications
Edge of the status bar pulls down QuickSettings
Sets color for statusbar icons and clock
Sets color for data activity indicators
When disabled, R indicator will not be visible while roaming. Use with caution.
Always on while screen is on
EXPERIMENTAL! Blinks button backlight when there is a notification. Use in case your device lacks notification LED. May consume battery.
Disables single-tap on keys while Pie Controls are enabled
Switches GB UI to use dark theme
Navigation bar (requires Navigation bar tweaks enabled)
Amount of brightness for dim state - when screen is about to be turned off (requires reboot)
Use only in case your device supports standard Android brightness features. Keep disabled if you experience brightness related issues. (requires reboot)
Links notification panel clock to a specified app instead of Date&Time settings
Waiting for response from GravityBox system framework…
GravityBox system framework not responding. Exiting.
Connect to data services when nationally roaming
Contains various navigation bar related tweaks
Applies to horizontal navigation bar and portrait orientation
Applies to horizontal navigation bar and landscape orientation
Adjusts brightness by sliding over statusbar (requires automatic brightness to be disabled)
Defines SIM slot to which network mode tile applies (%s)
When expanded desktop hides navigation bar
If enabled, the screen will come on when you plug/unplug usb/power/whatever (requires reboot)
Allows blocking of selected ongoing notifications
The list will get populated automatically for every ongoing notification that occurs. You can then decide whether to block ongoing notification next time it occurs. Use with caution.
Are you sure you want to reset list? This will clear current list and unblock all ongoing notifications previously blocked.
Unlock automatically when the correct PIN/password is entered
Auto (center or right depending on clock position)
Dialog allowing to define up to 12 apps which can be assigned as HW Key Action or used as additional navigation bar key
No apps assigned. Use GravityBox / Application launcher menu to assign apps.

Your screen might not support values lower than 20. If your screen doesn\'t light up, hold Volume+ key for at least 7 seconds to reset brightness and then adjust minimum brightness to use higher values.
Sets color for secondary data activity indicators
Applies to status icons like silent, vibrate, alarm, etc.
Touch to visit GravityBox Google+ community
In order to enable actions support for navigation bar, it is necessary to override system defaults in Navigation bar tweaks menu
Impossible to create launchable shortcut because activity did not return shortcut intent
Shortcut creation cancelled by target app
Cannot start new recording as previous recording is still being processed
Unable to save recording to output file
Shows dialpad automatically upon opening dialer app
Applies to stock launcher and Google Now Launcher
Using other values than default may break widgets\' layout. Use wisely. Changes require launcher to be restarted.
Enables cursor control keys in navigation bar while keyboard is showing
Collapses statusbar automatically on tile single-tap. Applies to GravityBox tiles and overriden stock tiles.
Show summary and hide on inactivity
Indicates data activity on mobile and WiFi icons (requires reboot)
Applies to custom wallpaper and album art only
When enabled, volume keys control media volume instead of ringer volume
Turns off torch after specified amount of time. Set to 0 to disable (not recommended)
Swap volume keys when the screen is rotated
This will automatically switch your radio to user-defined power saving mode or normal mode depending on mobile data and WiFi connection states (requires reboot)
Activates power saving mode when screen turns off regardless if mobile data is enabled or disabled
When screen turns on, power saving mode won\'t be deactivated until keyguard is unlocked
Delays changing of network mode by specified number of seconds
Delays switching to power saving mode when screen turns off. Overrides default network mode change delay if value is non-zero.
Your current preferences will be replaced. Are you sure?
Error generating app specific hash code
Error parsing data obtained from web service
Web service refused to communicate due to hash mismatch. This typically happens in case you run unofficial version or GravityBox APK has been modified by 3rd party.
Error parsing transaction data obtained from web service
Transaction ID verification succeeded. Premium features will be unlocked after GravityBox is restarted.
Unable to find record for specified transaction ID
Specified transaction ID has been registered too many times. Contact GravityBox dev to resolve.
Specified transaction ID has been blocked. Contact GravityBox dev to resolve.
In case you donated, you can enter your PayPal donation transaction ID to unlock premium features
This feature is premium and requires unlocking
Resize any widget to any size on the homescreen (requires launcher restart)
When there are no clearable notifications
Expands all notifications automatically when enabled
Whether to use microphone for audio input
Disables vibrate when adjusting notification/ringtone volume using volume keys
When enabled, stock screenrecord binary is used for recording. Use in case alternative binary causes issues. Note, that stock binary doesn\'t support audio and recordings longer than 3 minutes.
Toggles status bar clock settings (requires reboot)
Allows controlling notification lights, sounds and vibrations on per-app basis
Applies also to ongoing notifications when enabled
When enabled, the sound and/or vibration won\'t play in case notification already exists
When enabled, audio will be repeated until the notification is cancelled or the notification window is opened
Comma separated list of off/on duration pairs in milliseconds. Set to 0 to disable vibrations.
Comma separated list of off/on duration pairs in milliseconds. Leave empty for default vibration pattern.
Show red trail when wrong pattern is entered
This feature is in trial mode. If you find it useful you can continue using it after unlocking premium features. Trial period ends after %d reboots.
When on, default settings apply automatically to all applications that have no active explicit settings

Active Screen feature automatically turns on screen every time new notification arrives. This will happen only in case screen is not covered (e.g. when device is not in the pocket). It optionally expands notification panel depending on the current lock screen security policy and user preference. Be aware that Active Screen requires lock screen to be enabled.\nThe switch below is a master switch. After it\'s enabled, additional configuration can be done on per-app basis
Mutes sounds/vibrations and optionally LED for all notifications arriving within defined time range
Shows icon in status bar during quiet hours
Comma separated list of keywords for which to ignore Quiet hours. Leave empty for all notifications.
Notice:\nAs the start volume is set higher than the ringer volume, the ring tone will be played using the ringer volume.
Forces LTR layout direction for RTL locales (requires reboot)
Thank you for your support. Premium features will be unlocked after GravityBox is restarted.
Don\'t have PayPal? Simply touch here to get GravityBox premium feature unlocker from the Play Store.
Switches to normal mode even if mobile data is currently unavailable
